abstract: The online payments company will allow its customers to buy and target Facebook ads and then use sales data to assess the impact of those ads.
snippet: The online payments company will allow its customers to buy and target Facebook ads and then use sales data to assess the impact of those ads.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Square has long pitched itself to small businesses as a one-stop shop for processing customers’ credit cards. Now the company wants to help get more of those customers in the door.

headline.main: Square Teams Up With Facebook to Offer Ads That Can Be Gauged
headline.print_headline: Facebook and Square Assess Ads as a Team
